error.message: Call to deprecated function entity_render_cache_clear(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityViewBuilderInterface::resetCache() on the required entity types or invalidate specific cache tags.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to simple_tweets.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
